mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.tag_id AS tagId, a.user_id AS userId, a.issue_date AS issueDate, a.title AS title, a.content AS content, a.issue_status AS issueStatus, a.data_status AS dataStatus, b.`name` AS userName FROM article a LEFT JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{command.userId} AND a.data_status = 1
